Hello St. Johns! Come by for a tarot reading and check out some records!! With @sirbrantheblessed and DJ Mountain Cloud!

We‚Äôre excited to announce that we are hosting social Distance Saturday Tarot Readings with Sir Bran The Blessed! Starting July 4th  12-4:30 for scheduling or pricing call us or drop by!  Here‚Äôs their Bio...
Sir bran the blessed is a native North Portlander and hereditary enchantx, witch and conjurer who grew up practicing old school Hoodoo, New Orleans Voodoo, European Witchcraft and Curanderismo. Sir Bran‚Äôs personal approach is ‚Äúone should know the rules and then transcend them through rigorous study, humor, practice, commitment to diversity and innovation.‚Äù They apply this to their personal practice, their classes, Their Tarot readings and their extensive magickal work within the Portland area. Sir Bran is one of the preeminent tarot and heritage card readers in the Portland area. They are also the author of the upcoming book ‚ÄúThe Black, Brown and Queer Intersectional Magical survival guide‚Äù through Microcosm Publishing, illustator. of " The Holy Othered" tarot deck and Queen of the ZephyrHaus coven in Portland, Oregon. They also like pizza rolls, Maya Angelou and Dior. You can follow them on Instagram @Sirbrantheblessed  #tarot #local #witch #artist #queen #microcosmpublishing #stjohnspdx #love #pride #portlandoregon #localbookstore #witchcraft #godsandgoddesses #brownisbeautiful #queer
